mapper.insert: insert into tbl_global (global_id, global_htitle, global_footertext, global_attentiontitle, global_recommendtitle, global_categorytitle, global_commenttitle, global_ctime) values (#{globalId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{globalHtitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{globalFootertext,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{globalAttentiontitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{globalRecommendtitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{globalCategorytitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{globalCommenttitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{globalCtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

mapper.select: select global_id, global_htitle, global_footertext, global_attentiontitle, global_recommendtitle, global_categorytitle, global_commenttitle, global_ctime from tbl_global where global_id = #{globalId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
